BUR.heading_paragraph: လီယိုနာဒ် စရိုက်သွင်ပြင်စစ်တမ်း (LPI) သည် လူတစ်ဦးချင်း၏ စိတ်ခံစားမှုဆိုင်ရာ အမူအကျင့် သရုပ်ခွဲခြင်းနှင့် အောက်ဖော်ပြပါ အမူအကျင့်ဆိုင်ရာ ရှုထောင့်ငါးမျိုးအနက် လူတစ်ဦးချင်းသည် မည်သည့် အမူအကျင့်နှင့် ဆက်နွယ်သည်ကို ဖော်ပြခြင်းတို့ ပြုလုပ်ပေးနိုင်ပါသည်။ LPI သည် ခိုင်မာသော စရိုက်သွင်ပြင်ဟန် (၂၆)မျိုး ကို ဖော်ထုတ်ထားပြီး၊ ဘာသာစကား (၁၁)မျိုးအထိ ပြန်ဆိုပြီးဖြစ်သည်။ LPI ၏အစီရင်ခံချက်သည် သင့်ကိုယ်သင်နှင့် သင်၏အမူအကျင့်များကို ပိုမိုနားလည်လာစေရန် ကူညီပေးပါမည်။.
BUR.personality_sub_heading: ယေဘုယျအားဖြင့် သင်၏ စရိုက်သွင်ပြင်ကို ဤအတိုင်း သုံးသပ်နိုင်သည်၊ Generally, your personality can be summarized as that of

personality.CREATIVE IMAGINATOR: တီထွင်သော စိတ်ကူးဉာဏ်ရှိသူ Creative Imaginator
personality.NEUTRAL EXPERT: ကြားနေကျွမ်းကျင်သူ Neutral Expert
personality.ANALYTICAL THINKER: ပိုင်းခြားစိတ်ဖြာ တွေးတောသူ Analytical Thinker
personality.RELATIONAL INTERACTOR: ဆက်နွယ်မှုအရ တုံ့ပြန်သူ Relational Interactor
personality.DECISIVE DECISION MAKER: တိကျပြတ်သားစွာ ဆုံးဖြတ်ချက်ချသူ Decisive Decision Maker
personality.CREATIVE EXPERT: တီထွင်ဖန်တီးမှု ကျွမ်းကျင်သူ Creative Expert
personality.CREATIVE THINKER: ထွင်ဉာဏ်ရှိသော အတွေးသမား Creative Thinker
personality.CREATIVE RELATER: တီထွင်ဖန်တီးမှု နှီးနွယ်သူ Creative Relater
personality.CREATIVE DECISION MAKER: ထွင်ဉာဏ်ရှိသော အဆုံးအဖြတ်ပြုနိုင်သူ Creative Decision Maker
personality.ERROR BUSTER: အမှားများကို ဖြိုခွင်းတားဆီးသူ Error Buster
personality.HELPFUL ENCOURAGER: ကူညီအားပေးသူ Helpful Encourager
personality.ACCOMPLISHER: ပြောင်မြောက်ကျွမ်းကျင်သူ Accomplisher
personality.ASSESSOR: အကဲဖြတ်သူ Assessor
personality.IMPLEMENTER: အောင်မြင်အောင် ရွက်ဆောင်သူ Implementer
personality.EXHORTER: တွန်းအားပေးတိုက်တွန်းသူ Exhorter
personality.VERSATILE: စွယ်စုံရသူ Versatile
personality.CREATIVE ERROR BUSTER: ထွင်ဉာဏ်ရှိသော အမှားများဖြိုခွင်းသူ Creative Error Buster
personality.CREATIVE ENCOURAGER: ထွင်ဉာဏ်ရှိသော အားပေးသူ Creative Encourager
personality.CREATIVE ACCOMPLISHER: ထွင်ဉာဏ်ရှိသော ပြောင်မြောက်ကျွမ်းကျင်သူ Creative Accomplisher
personality.CREATIVE ASSESSOR: ထွင်ဉာဏ်ရှိသော အကဲဖြတ်သူ Creative Assessor
personality.INNOVATOR: ဖန်တီးတီထွင်သူ Innovator
personality.CREATIVE EXHORTER: ထွင်ဉာဏ်ရှိသော တွန်းအားပေးသူ Creative Exhorter
personality.AMIABLE ADAPTOR: ဖော်ရွေတတ်သော ကြားခံသမား Amiable Adaptor
personality.RESOURCEFUL STRATEGIST: ကြံရည်ဖန်ရည်ကောင်းသော ဗျူဟာသမား Resourceful Strategist
personality.PERSUASIVE DECISION MAKER: အပြောကောင်းသော ဆုံးဖြတ်သူ Persuasive Decision Maker
personality.ENERGETIC STRATEGIST: တက်ကြွသော ဗျူဟာသမား Energetic Strategist

text_below_graph.O: ပွင့်လင်းသူ Openness
text_below_graph.N: ဘက်မလိုက်သူ Neutral
text_below_graph.A: သုံးသပ်တတ်သူ Analytical
text_below_graph.R: ဆက်ဆံရေးကောင်းသူ Relational
text_below_graph.D: တိကျပြတ်သားသူ Decisive

report_titles.GENERAL_STRENGTH: သင့်အားသာမှုများမှာ ဤအတိုင်းဖြစ်သည် Your strengths are as follows
report_titles.GENERAL_WEAKNESS: သင့်တွင် ဤအားနည်းချက်များရှိသည် You may have these weaknesses
report_titles.SUMMARY_STRENGTH: သင့်အားသာချက်များ၏ အချုပ်မှာ ဤအတိုင်းဖြစ်သည် A summary of your strengths are as follows
report_titles.SUMMARY_WEAKNESS: သင့်အားနည်းချက်များ၏ အချုပ်မှာ ဤအတိုင်းဖြစ်သည် A summary of your weaknesses are as follows
report_titles.IMPROVING_EQ: သင့်စိတ်ခံစားမှုအသိဉာဏ်(EQ) ရင့်သန်စေရန်၊ ဤသည်တို့ ဖွံဖြိုးသင့်သည်  In order to nurture your Emotional Intelligence (EQ), you should develop
report_titles.CREATIVITY: သင်သည် သင့်ဖန်တီးနိုင်စွမ်းကို ဤနည်းများအတိုင်း ဖော်ပြလေ့ရှိသည် You tend to express your creativity in the following ways
report_titles.IMPROVE_CREATIVITY: သင့်ဖန်တီးနိုင်စွမ်းအ‌ပေါ် ဤသို့အားဖြင့် သင်တိုးတက်စေလိမ့်မည် How you might improve on your creativity
report_titles.HELP_ORGANISATION: သင့်အဖွဲ့အစည်းကို ဤသို့ သင်ကူညီနိုင်သည် You can help your organization by
report_titles.LEADERSHIP: ဦးဆောင်မှုနှင့် ကြီးကြပ်မှု ကဏ္ဍတို့တွင် သင့်အနေဖြင့် ဤသည်တို့ကို ကြိုးစားကြည့်ရန် အရေးကြီးသည် In leadership and supervisory roles, it is important that you try to do the following steps
report_titles.RELATIONSHIP: သင်၏ အခြားသူများနှင့် လူမှုဆက်ဆံ‌ရေး အားကောင်းလာစေရန် ဤသည်တို့ကို ပြုကျင့်ကြည့်ပါ To enrich your interpersonal relationships with others, try to do the following
report_titles.CONFLICT: ပဋိပက္ခတို့ ကြုံစဥ်အခါ ဤသည်ကို သင်ပြုလေ့ရှိမည် In facing conflicts, you tend to do this
report_titles.MANAGE_CONFLICT: ပဋိပက္ခတို့ ကြုံစဥ်အခါ သင့်ကိုယ်သင် ပိုကောင်းအောင် အဘယ်သို့ စီမံမည်နည်း How to better manage yourself when facing conflict
report_titles.STRESS: ဤအပြုအမူတို့သည် ဖိစီးမှုကို ဖြစ်စေသည် The following actions may cause stress
report_titles.WHY_STRESS: ဖိစီးမှု - သင်ပြုမူသည့်အတိုင်း အဘယ်ကြောင့် တုံ့ပြန်သနည်း Stress - Why you react the way you do
report_titles.OVERCOME_STRESS: ဖိစီးမှု - သင့်၏မဆီလျော်သော တုံ့ပြန်မှုများကို အဘယ်သို့ ကျော်လွှားမည်နည်း Stress - How to overcome your unfavourable reactions
report_titles.LEARNING_ATTITUDE: သင်ယူလေ့လာရန် သင်၏ ချဥ်းကပ်မှု/နည်းဗျူဟာ နှင့် သဘောထား Your approach/strategy and attitude towards learning
report_titles.IMPROVE_LEARNING_ATTITUDE: ပိုမိုထိ‌ရောက်သော သင်ယူလေ့လာသူ ဖြစ်လာရန် To be a more effective learner
report_titles.DISPLAYHUMOR: သင်သည် ဤအပြုအမူများတွင် ပြက်လုံးထုတ်လေ့ရှိသည် You tend to display humour in the following manner:
report_titles.USEHUMOR: ပြက်လုံးထုတ်မည်ဆိုလျှင် ဤသည်တို့ကို သတိပြုပါ When using humour be careful of the following:
report_titles.FINANCIAL_STRENGTHS: ဤအချက်များသည် သင့်၏ ‌‌ငွေရေး‌ကြေးရေးဆိုင်ရာ အားသာချက်များတည်း These are your financial strengths
report_titles.FINANCIAL_WISDOM: ယင်းသည် သင့်အား ဤငွေကြေးဆိုင်ရာ ရှုမြင်တွေးခေါ်မှုတို့ကို ဖွံဖြိုးစေဖို့ရာ အသုံးတည့်နိုင်သည် It might be useful for you to develop these financial wisdom

ENG.heading_paragraph: The LEONARD Personality Inventory (LPI) can identify a person's emotional orientation and locate a person's preferred behavioural orientations on any of the five behavioural dimensions below. The LPI yields 26 classical personality styles and is available in 11 languages. The LPI report allows you to understand yourself and your behaviour better.

GER.heading_paragraph: Das LEONARD Personality Inventory (LPI) kann die emotionale Orientierung einer Person identifizieren und die bevorzugten Verhaltensorientierungen einer Person in einer der fünf folgenden Verhaltensdimensionen lokalisieren. Der LPI ergibt 26 klassische Persönlichkeitsstile und ist in 11 Sprachen verfügbar. Der LPI-Bericht ermöglicht es Ihnen, sich selbst und Ihr Verhalten besser zu verstehen.
GER.personality_sub_heading: Im Allgemeinen kann Ihre Persönlichkeit als die von zusammengefasst werden Generally, your personality can be summarized as that of

report_titles.GENERAL_STRENGTH: Ihre Stärken sind wie folgt Your strengths are as follows
report_titles.GENERAL_WEAKNESS: Sie können diese Schwächen haben You may have these weaknesses
report_titles.SUMMARY_STRENGTH: Eine Zusammenfassung Ihrer Stärken lautet wie folgt A summary of your strengths are as follows
report_titles.SUMMARY_WEAKNESS: Eine Zusammenfassung Ihrer Schwächen lautet wie folgt A summary of your weaknesses are as follows

report_titles.IMPROVE_CREATIVITY: Wie Sie Ihre Kreativität verbessern können How you might improve on your creativity
report_titles.HELP_ORGANISATION: Sie können Ihrer Organisation helfen, indem Sie You can help your organization by
report_titles.LEADERSHIP: In Führungs- und Aufsichtsfunktionen ist es wichtig, dass Sie versuchen, die folgenden Schritte auszuführen In leadership and supervisory roles, it is important that you try to do the following steps
report_titles.RELATIONSHIP: Um Ihre zwischenmenschlichen Beziehungen zu anderen zu bereichern, versuchen Sie Folgendes zu tun To enrich your interpersonal relationships with others, try to do the following
report_titles.CONFLICT: Wenn man sich Konflikten stellt, neigt man dazu, dies zu tun In facing conflicts, you tend to do this
report_titles.MANAGE_CONFLICT: Wie man sich im Konflikt besser managen kann How to better manage yourself when facing conflict
report_titles.STRESS: Die folgenden Aktionen können Stress verursachen The following actions may cause stress
report_titles.WHY_STRESS: Stress - Warum du so reagierst, wie du es tust Stress - Why you react the way you do
report_titles.OVERCOME_STRESS: Stress - Wie Sie Ihre ungünstigen Reaktionen überwinden können Stress - How to overcome your unfavourable reactions
report_titles.LEARNING_ATTITUDE: Ihre Herangehensweise/Strategie und Einstellung zum Lernen Your approach/strategy and attitude towards learning
report_titles.IMPROVE_LEARNING_ATTITUDE: Ein effektiverer Lerner zu sein To be a more effective learner
report_titles.DISPLAYHUMOR: Sie neigen dazu, Humor auf folgende Weise zu zeigen: You tend to display humour in the following manner:
report_titles.USEHUMOR: Achten Sie bei der Verwendung von Humor auf Folgendes: When using humour be careful of the following:
report_titles.FINANCIAL_STRENGTHS: Das sind Ihre finanziellen Stärken These are your financial strengths
report_titles.FINANCIAL_WISDOM: Es könnte für Sie nützlich sein, diese finanzielle Weisheit zu entwickeln It might be useful for you to develop these financial wisdom
report_titles.CAREER: Sie könnten diese Karrieren genießen You might enjoy these careers
report_titles.SPORTS: Sie könnten diese Sportarten genießen You might enjoy these sports

IDN.heading_paragraph: LEONARD Personality Inventory (LPI) dapat mengidentifikasi orientasi emosional seseorang dan menemukan kecenderungan orientasi perilaku seseorang pada salah satu dari lima dimensi perilaku di bawah ini. LPI menghasilkan 26 macam kepribadian klasik dan tersedia dalam 11 bahasa. Laporan LPI memungkinkan Anda untuk memahami diri Anda sendiri dan perilaku Anda dengan lebih baik.
IDN.personality_sub_heading: Secara umum, kepribadian Anda dapat digolongkan dalam

report_titles.GENERAL_WEAKNESS: Anda mungkin memiliki kekurangan sebagai berikut
report_titles.SUMMARY_STRENGTH: Ringkasan kelebihan Anda adalah sebagai berikut
report_titles.SUMMARY_WEAKNESS: Ringkasan kekurangan Anda adalah sebagai berikut
report_titles.IMPROVING_EQ: Untuk memelihara Kecerdasan Emosional (EQ), Anda harus mengembangkan
report_titles.CREATIVITY: Anda cenderung mengekspresikan kreativitas Anda dengan cara
report_titles.IMPROVE_CREATIVITY: Bagaimana cara Anda dapat meningkatkan kreativitas Anda
report_titles.HELP_ORGANISATION: Anda dapat membantu organisasi Anda dengan cara
report_titles.LEADERSHIP: Dalam peran sebagai seorang pemimpin dan supervisor, penting bagi Anda untuk mencoba melakukan langkah-langkah berikut ini
report_titles.RELATIONSHIP: Untuk memperkaya hubungan interpersonal Anda dengan orang lain, cobalah lakukan hal-hal berikut ini
report_titles.CONFLICT: Dalam menghadapi konflik, Anda memiliki kecenderungan melakukan
report_titles.MANAGE_CONFLICT: Bagaimana cara mengontrol diri sendiri secara lebih baik saat menghadapi konflik
report_titles.STRESS: Tindakan-tindakan yang berpontensi dapat menyebabkan stres
report_titles.WHY_STRESS: Stres - Kenapa Anda bereaksi seperti itu
report_titles.OVERCOME_STRESS: Stres - Cara mengatasi reaksi tidak menyenangkan

report_titles.SPORTS: Anda mungkin akan menyukai jenis olahraga ini

CMB.heading_paragraph: The LEONARD Personality Inventory (LPI)/សារពើភ័ណ្ឌបុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈ LEONARD (LPI) អាចកំណត់អត្តសញ្ញាណដែលមានឥទ្ធពលទៅលើអារម្មណ៍របស់មនុស្ស និងកំណត់អាកប្បកិរិយាដែលបុគ្គលណាម្នាក់ពេញចិត្តតាមវិមាត្រអាកប្បកិរិយាទាំងប្រាំខាងក្រោម។ LPI រចនាបថបុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈបុរាណចំនួន ២៦ ហើយមាន ១១ ភាសា។ របាយការណ៍ LPI អនុញ្ញាតឱ្យអ្នកយល់ពីខ្លួនឯង និងអាកប្បកិរិយារបស់អ្នកកាន់តែប្រសើរឡើង។.
CMB.personality_sub_heading: ជាទូទៅ បុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈរបស់អ្នកអាចត្រូវបានសង្ខេបថាជា

personality.CREATIVE IMAGINATOR: មនោគតិជនប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Imaginator
personality.NEUTRAL EXPERT: អ្នកជំនាញការអព្យាក្រិត Neutral Expert
personality.ANALYTICAL THINKER: អ្នកមានគំនិតបែបវិភាគ Analytical Thinker
personality.RELATIONAL INTERACTOR: អ្នកជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងអន្តរបុគ្គល Relational Interactor
personality.DECISIVE DECISION MAKER: អ្នកធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្តបានច្បាស់លាស់ Decisive Decision Maker
personality.CREATIVE EXPERT: អ្នកជំនាញប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Expert
personality.CREATIVE THINKER: អ្នកគិតគូរប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Thinker
personality.CREATIVE RELATER: អ្នកជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Relater
personality.CREATIVE DECISION MAKER: អ្នកធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្តប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Decision Maker
personality.ERROR BUSTER: អ្នកលុបបំបាត់កំហុសឆ្គង Error Buster
personality.HELPFUL ENCOURAGER: អ្នកចេះលើកទឹកចិត្តជួយយកអាសារគេឯង Helpful Encourager
personality.ACCOMPLISHER: អ្នកសម្រេចកិច្ចការបានល្អ Accomplisher
personality.ASSESSOR: អ្នកចេះវាយតម្លៃ Assessor
personality.IMPLEMENTER: អ្នកអនុវត្ត Implementer
personality.EXHORTER: អ្នកពូកែបញ្ចុះបញ្ចូល Exhorter
personality.VERSATILE: ពូកែបត់បែន Versatile
personality.CREATIVE ERROR BUSTER: អ្នកលុបបំបាត់កំហុសឆ្គងដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Error Buster
personality.CREATIVE ENCOURAGER: ជាអ្នកចេះលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Encourager
personality.CREATIVE ACCOMPLISHER: អ្នកសម្រេចកិច្ចការបានល្អប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Accomplisher
personality.CREATIVE ASSESSOR: អ្នកវាយតម្លៃប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Assessor
personality.INNOVATOR: អ្នកពូកែបង្កើតគំនិតថ្មីៗ Innovator
personality.CREATIVE EXHORTER: អ្នកពូកែបញ្ចុះបញ្ចូលប្រកបដោយប្រឌិតញាណ Creative Exhorter
personality.AMIABLE ADAPTOR: អ្នកសម្របសម្រួលដែលមានអាធ្យាស្រ័យល្អ Amiable Adaptor
personality.RESOURCEFUL STRATEGIST: អ្នកយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រដ៏ប៉ិនប្រសប់ Resourceful Strategist
personality.PERSUASIVE DECISION MAKER: អ្នកធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្តដ៏មានឥទ្ធិពល Persuasive Decision Maker
personality.ENERGETIC STRATEGIST: អ្នកយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រដ៏មានថាមពល Energetic Strategist

report_titles.GENERAL_STRENGTH: ចំណុចខ្លាំងរបស់អ្នកមានដូចខាងក្រោម Your strengths are as follows

report_titles.IMPROVING_EQ: ដើម្បីបណ្តុះបញ្ញាអារម្មណ៍ (EQ) អ្នកគ្បបីតែអភិវឌ្ឍ In order to nurture your Emotional Intelligence (EQ), you should develop
report_titles.CREATIVITY: អ្នកតែងតែបង្ហាញពីភាពច្នៃប្រឌិតរបស់អ្នកតាមវិធីខាងក្រោម You tend to express your creativity in the following ways
report_titles.IMPROVE_CREATIVITY: របៀបដែលអ្នកអាចធ្វើឲ្យភាពច្នៃប្រឌិតរបស់អ្នកកាន់តែប្រសើរឡើង How you might improve on your creativity
report_titles.HELP_ORGANISATION: អ្នកអាចជួយអង្គការរបស់អ្នកដោយ You can help your organization by
report_titles.LEADERSHIP: នៅក្នុងតួនាទីជាអ្នកដឹកនាំនិងត្រួតពិនិត្យវាជារឿងសំខាន់ដែលអ្នកគប្បីធ្វើតាមចំណុចខាងក្រោម In leadership and supervisory roles, it is important that you try to do the following steps
report_titles.RELATIONSHIP: ដើម្បីបង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងបុគ្កលជាមួយនិងអ្នកដទៃ អ្នកគប្បី To enrich your interpersonal relationships with others, try to do the following
report_titles.CONFLICT: នៅពេលដែលជួបប្រទះជាមួយនឹងបញ្ហា អ្នកងាយនិងធ្វើ In facing conflicts, you tend to do this
report_titles.MANAGE_CONFLICT: វិធីសាស្រ្តគ្រប់គ្រងខ្លួនឯងឲ្យបានប្រសើរ នៅពេលប្រឈមមុខនឹងជំលោះ How to better manage yourself when facing conflict
report_titles.STRESS: វិធានការខាងក្រោមនេះអាចបណ្តាលឲ្យកើតមានភាពតានតឹងក្នុងអារម្មណ៍ The following actions may cause stress
report_titles.WHY_STRESS: តានតឹងក្នុងអារម្មណ៍ - មូលហេតុដែលអ្នកប្រតិកម្មទៅនឹងវិធីដែលអ្នកធ្វើ Stress - Why you react the way you do
report_titles.OVERCOME_STRESS: តានតឹងក្នុងអារម្មណ៍ - វិធីសាស្រ្តជំនះលើប្រតិកម្មអវិជ្ជមានរបស់អ្នក Stress - How to overcome your unfavourable reactions
report_titles.LEARNING_ATTITUDE: វិធីសាស្រ្ត យុទ្ធសាស្រ្ត និងឥរិយាបថរបស់អ្នកចំពោះការសិក្សា Your approach/strategy and attitude towards learning
report_titles.IMPROVE_LEARNING_ATTITUDE: ដើម្បីក្លាយខ្លួនជាអ្នកសិក្សាកាន់តែពូកែ To be a more effective learner
report_titles.DISPLAYHUMOR: អ្នកមានទំនោរបង្ហាញពីភាពកំប្លែងនៅក្នុងលក្ខណៈដូចតទៅ You tend to display humour in the following manner:
report_titles.USEHUMOR: ពេលនិយាយកំប្លែងត្រូវប្រយ័ត្នដូចខាងក្រោម When using humour be careful of the following:
report_titles.FINANCIAL_STRENGTHS: នេះគឺជាចំណុចខ្លាំងខាងផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុរបស់អ្នក These are your financial strengths
report_titles.FINANCIAL_WISDOM: វាអាចមានប្រយោជន៍សម្រាប់អ្នកក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ប្រាជ្ញាហិរញ្ញវត្ថុទាំងនេះ It might be useful for you to develop these financial wisdom
report_titles.CAREER: អ្នកប្រហែងនឹងចូលចិត្ដការងារទាំងនេះ You might enjoy these careers
report_titles.SPORTS: អ្នកអាចនឹងចូលចិត្ដកីឡាទាំងនេះ You might enjoy these sports

MLY.heading_paragraph: LEONARD Personaliti Inventori (LPI) dapat mengenal pasti orientasi emosi seseorang dan mengenal pasti orientasi tingkah laku pilihan seseorang pada mana-mana lima dimensi tingkah laku di bawah. LPI menghasilkan 26 personaliti klasik dan boleh didapati dalam 11 bahasa. Laporan LPI membolehkan anda memahami diri anda dan tingkah laku anda dengan lebih baik.
MLY.personality_sub_heading: Secara amnya, personaliti anda boleh diringkaskan sebagai

report_titles.USEHUMOR: Apabila menggunakan humor berhati-hati dengan perkara berikut:
report_titles.FINANCIAL_STRENGTHS: Ini adalah kekuatan anda dari segi kewangan.
report_titles.FINANCIAL_WISDOM: Ada bagusnya anda berusaha meningkatkan ilmu kewangan

report_titles.SPORTS: Anda mungkin akan meminati jenis-jenis sukan ini

PID.heading_paragraph: The LEONARD Personality Inventory (LPI) can identify a person's emotional orientation and locate a person's preferred behavioural orientations on any of the five behavioural dimensions below. The LPI yields 26 classical personality styles and is available in 11 languages. The LPI report allows you to understand yourself and your behaviour better.
PID.personality_sub_heading: Generally, your personality can be summarized as that of

report_titles.SUMMARY_WEAKNESS: A summary of your weaknesses are as follows

THA.heading_paragraph: แบบสำรวจบุคลิกภาพของลีโอนาร์ด (LPI) สามารถระบุการกำหนดเป้าหมายทางอารมณ์ของบุคคลและค้นหาการกำหนดเป้าหมายพฤติกรรมที่ต้องการของบุคคลในมิติพฤติกรรมทั้งห้าด้านล่างนี้ LPI นำเสนอรูปแบบบุคลิกภาพคลาสสิก 26 แบบและพร้อมให้บริการใน 11 ภาษา รายงาน LPI ช่วยให้คุณเข้าใจตัวเองและพฤติกรรมของคุณได้ดียิ่งขึ้น. The LEONARD Personality Inventory (LPI) can identify a person's emotional orientation and locate a person's preferred behavioural orientations on any of the five behavioural dimensions below. The LPI yields 26 classical personality styles and is available in 11 languages. The LPI report allows you to understand yourself and your behaviour better.
THA.personality_sub_heading: โดยทั่วไป บุคลิกภาพของคุณสามารถสรุปได้ดังต่อไปนี้. Generally, your personality can be summarized as that of

personality.CREATIVE IMAGINATOR: นักจินตนาการเชิงสร้างสรรค์ Creative Imaginator
personality.NEUTRAL EXPERT: ผู้เชี่ยวชาญที่เป็นกลาง Neutral Expert
personality.ANALYTICAL THINKER: นักคิดเชิงวิเคราะห์ Analytical Thinker
personality.RELATIONAL INTERACTOR: ผู้โต้ตอบเชิงสัมพันธ์ Relational Interactor
personality.DECISIVE DECISION MAKER: ผู้มีอำนาจตัดสินใจเด็ดขาด Decisive Decision Maker
personality.CREATIVE EXPERT: ผู้เชี่ยวชาญเชิงความคิดสร้างสรรค์ Creative Expert
personality.CREATIVE THINKER: นักคิดเชิงสร้างสรรค์ Creative Thinker
personality.CREATIVE RELATER: ผู้บรรยายเชิงสร้างสรรค์ Creative Relater
personality.CREATIVE DECISION MAKER: ผู้ตัดสินใจเชิงสร้างสรรค์ Creative Decision Maker
personality.ERROR BUSTER: มือปราบข้อผิดพลาด Error Buster
personality.HELPFUL ENCOURAGER: ผู้ให้กำลังใจที่ชอบช่วยเหลือ Helpful Encourager
personality.ACCOMPLISHER: ผู้บรรลุผล Accomplisher
personality.ASSESSOR: ผู้ประเมิน Assessor
personality.IMPLEMENTER: ผู้ดำเนินการ Implementer
personality.EXHORTER: ผู้ตักเตือน Exhorter
personality.VERSATILE: ผู้ที่เก่งหลายด้าน Versatile

VET.heading_paragraph: Hệ thống đối chiếu tính cách LEONARD (LPI) có thể xác định được định hướng cảm xúc và hành vi ưa thích của một người dựa vào năm khía cạnh hành vi dưới đây. LPI tạo ra 26 phong cách cá tính cổ điển và có sẵn bằng 11 ngôn ngữ. Báo cáo LPI cho phép bạn hiểu bản thân và hành vi của mình tốt hơn.
VET.personality_sub_heading: Nhìn chung, tính cách của bạn có thể được tóm tắt như sau

personality.CREATIVE IMAGINATOR: Người tưởng tượng sáng tạo. Creative Imaginator
personality.NEUTRAL EXPERT: Chuyên gia trung lập. Neutral Expert
personality.ANALYTICAL THINKER: Người tư duy phân tích. Analytical Thinker
personality.RELATIONAL INTERACTOR: Người tương tác quan hệ. Relational Interactor
personality.DECISIVE DECISION MAKER: Người ra quyết định quyết đoán. Decisive Decision Maker
personality.CREATIVE EXPERT: Chuyên gia sáng tạo. Creative Expert
personality.CREATIVE THINKER: Người tư duy sáng tạo. Creative Thinker
personality.CREATIVE RELATER: Người giao thiệp sáng tạo. Creative Relater
personality.CREATIVE DECISION MAKER: Người ra quyết định sáng tạo. Creative Decision Maker
personality.VERSATILE: Người đa năng linh hoạt. Versatile
personality.CREATIVE ERROR BUSTER: Người sửa lỗi sáng tạo. Creative Error Buster
personality.CREATIVE ENCOURAGER: Người khích lệ sáng tạo. Creative Encourager
personality.CREATIVE ASSESSOR: Người đánh giá sáng tạo. Creative Assessor
personality.INNOVATOR: Người cải tiến đột phá. Innovator
personality.CREATIVE EXHORTER: Người cổ vũ sáng tạo. Creative Exhorter
personality.AMIABLE ADAPTOR: Người thích nghi thân thiện. Amiable Adaptor
personality.RESOURCEFUL STRATEGIST: Nhà chiến lược đa năng. Resourceful Strategist
personality.PERSUASIVE DECISION MAKER: Người ra quyết định thuyết phục. Persuasive Decision Maker
personality.ENERGETIC STRATEGIST: Nhà chiến lược năng động. Energetic Strategist

report_titles.IMPROVE_CREATIVITY: Cách mà bạn có thể cải thiện khả năng sáng tạo của mình. How you might improve on your creativity
report_titles.HELP_ORGANISATION: Bạn có thể giúp tổ chức của mình bằng cách. You can help your organization by
report_titles.LEADERSHIP: Trong vai trò lãnh đạo và quản lý, cố gắng thực hiện những bước sau đây là rất quan trọng. In leadership and supervisory roles, it is important that you try to do the following steps
report_titles.RELATIONSHIP: Để làm giàu cho mối quan hệ cá nhân của bạn với người khác, hãy cố gắng làm điều sau đây. To enrich your interpersonal relationships with others, try to do the following
report_titles.CONFLICT: Khi đối diện với xung đột, bạn có khuynh hướng làm điều này. In facing conflicts, you tend to do this
report_titles.MANAGE_CONFLICT: Cách thức để quản lý bản thân tốt hơn khi đối diện với xung đột. How to better manage yourself when facing conflict
report_titles.STRESS: Những hành động sau đây có thể gây ra căng thẳng. The following actions may cause stress
report_titles.WHY_STRESS: Căng thẳng – Vì sao bạn phản ứng theo cách của mình. Stress - Why you react the way you do
report_titles.OVERCOME_STRESS: Căng thẳng – Cách thức giúp vượt qua những phản ứng tiêu cực của bạn. Stress - How to overcome your unfavourable reactions
report_titles.LEARNING_ATTITUDE: Cách tiếp cận/chiến thuật và thái độ của bạn đối với việc học hỏi. Your approach/strategy and attitude towards learning
report_titles.IMPROVE_LEARNING_ATTITUDE: Để là một người học hỏi hiệu quả hơn. To be a more effective learner
report_titles.DISPLAYHUMOR: Bạn có khuynh hướng thể hiện sự hài hước theo kiểu sau đây. You tend to display humour in the following manner:
report_titles.USEHUMOR: Khi sử dụng óc hài hước, cần thận trọng với những điều sau. When using humour be careful of the following:
report_titles.FINANCIAL_STRENGTHS: Đây là những điểm mạnh về tài chính của bạn. These are your financial strengths
report_titles.FINANCIAL_WISDOM: Sẽ hữu ích nếu bạn áp dụng nhưng lời khuyên thông thái về tài chính này. It might be useful for you to develop these financial wisdom
report_titles.CAREER: Bạn có thể thích những nghề nghiệp này. You might enjoy these careers
report_titles.SPORTS: Bạn có thể thích những môn thể thao này. You might enjoy these sports

FLP.heading_paragraph: Maaaring tukuyin ng LEONARD Personality Inventory (LPI) ang emosyonal na oryentasyon ng isang tao at hanapin ang ginustong mga oryentasyon sa pag-uugali sa alinman sa limang dimensyon ng pag-uugali sa ibaba. Ang LPI ay nagbubunga ng 26 na klasikal na istilo ng personalidad at magagamit sa 11 mga wika. Ang ulat ng LPI ay nagbibigay-daan sa iyo na mas maunawaan ang iyong sarili at ang iyong pag-uugali..
FLP.personality_sub_heading: Sa pangkalahatan, ang iyong personalidad ay maaaring ibuod bilang isang Generally, your personality can be summarized as that of

personality.DECISIVE DECISION MAKER: Hindi Mapag-alinlangan sa Paggawa ng Desisyon Decisive Decision Maker
personality.CREATIVE ERROR BUSTER: Malikhaing Buster ng Kamalian Creative Error Buster
personality.PERSUASIVE DECISION MAKER: Mapanghikayat sa Paggawa ng Desisyon Persuasive Decision Maker
personality.ENERGETIC STRATEGIST: Masigla sa Paggawa ng Mahusay na Pamamaraan Energetic Strategist
